name: Guardians Of Zernia (Eng. Version)
description:
Guardians of Zernia is a 2D Action RPG. Our beloved hero's got saved in his childhood by a member of the honored and renknowed Guardians of Zernia, the Royal Guard of King Carlos III, and since them look forward to meet his savior.

At the beginning of the game is our hero's 17th birthday, when he finally reaches the minimum age to enlist to the guard.

The game is still in development and as our team is really short atm (1 person only ='( ) it's taking too long to actually keep things going. 

Future updates will come with Skill Tree and Basic Classes ( Warrior and Mage )

 Feel free to feedback me, I'd like to hear your thoughts.
